page.title: 12Grafham Water Sailing Club.
page.content: The reservoir, with no high ground around, offers ideal conditions for {small boat sailing.}The club was founded in 1961 and sailing started in 1966. It is run by the members and is responsible for safety arrangements, and providing a rescue service when the water is open for sailing. There are 1250 members who keep a total of 660 boats at the club. In addition there are 5000 visitors each year, mainly{board sailors.} Regular{club races}are held on Sundays and Wednesdays. There are separate starts for the ten most popular classes, a handicap fleet and a junior fleet. The club is a popular venue for {international championships.}The club facilities are also used by many people who like to potter about in boats.
